thread.title: Disgusting! KRK feels Ranveer Singh looks like a 'terrorist' in this outfit
thread.title_full: Disgusting! KRK feels Ranveer Singh looks like a 'terrorist' in this outfit - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Disgusting! KRK feels Ranveer Singh looks like a 'terrorist' in this outfit
text:
Ranveer Singh at Shahid Kapoor's pre-birthday bash. Pic/Yogen Shah 
Bollywood actor Ranveer Singh's outfit at Shahid Kapoor's pre-birthday bash reminded several trolls of a 'condom'. Self-proclaimed critic Kamaal R Khan, however, made a controversial remark by stating that the outfit reminded him of a 'terrorist'.

Kamaal R Khan 
On Wednesday, KRK took to Twitter to share a photo of Ranveer Singh wearing the eccentric outfit. While posting the picture, KRK wrote, "Who is this guy? He looks like a terrorist of ISIS."
Here's a screenshot of KRK's tweet: 

 
Here's how some Twitterati reacted to KRK's post: 
@m_kaisar @kamaalrkhan aur tu kya hai be ?
— Pravarsh Sharma (@PravarshSharma) February 22, 2017 @kamaalrkhan he is the most daring person in this world to wear this dress No one's as daring as him Luv u RanveerðÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂðÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂÂ
— AKANSHA VERMA (@loyal_akansha) February 22, 2017 @kamaalrkhan nice joke
— Súñítà Pàñdít (@SuntiaPandit) February 22, 2017 @kamaalrkhan and what are you??? Jamadar of ISIS????
— Souvik Ghosh (@souvikrick) February 22, 2017 Also read:  Viral Photo: Ranveer Singh's eccentric outfit reminds trolls of 'condoms' 
 
Kamaal R Khan recently grabbed headlines for trying to troll Swara Bhaskar and failing miserably. KRK tried to troll the Bollywood actress on Twitter with a nasty remark about her upcoming film 'Anaarkali of Aarah'. The actress shut him down like a boss with one tweet!
KRK tries to troll Swara Bhaskar and she destroys him with one tweet!
